title: The Lightworker's Way: Awakening Your Spirtual Power To Know And Heal
description: The bestselling author of The Yo-Yo Diet Syndrome, Losing Your Pounds of Pain, and Constant Craving now brings readers an enlightening new book which tells them how to connect with their inner calling, how to recognize their higher purpose, and how to gain spiritual power for healing.
author: Doreen Virtue
